The chatbot should understand what I'm saying, even if I don't use perfect grammar or spelling.
The chatbot should give me relevant and helpful answers to my questions.
The chatbot should get better at understanding and responding to me over time.
The chatbot should be able to handle different ways of talking, like formal and informal language.
The chatbot's responses should be easy to understand and not too long.
The chatbot should be able to remember my preferences and personalize its responses accordingly.
The chatbot should be able to communicate in multiple languages.
The chatbot should be available to answer my questions anytime, day or night.
The chatbot should be easy to integrate into my existing website or app.
The chatbot should be able to understand the context of our conversation and respond accordingly.
The pricing plans should be clear and easy to understand.
There should be different pricing options to choose from, depending on my needs.
I should be able to try the chatbot for free before committing to a paid plan.
It should be easy to get in touch with customer support if I have any questions or problems.
Customer support should respond to my inquiries promptly.
